```{python}
with open("./dracula.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    drac = f.read()
```

```{python}
with open("./peter_pan.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    pan = f.read()
```

```{python}
#cleaning dracula
import re

words_drac = re.split(r"[\s\W]+", drac) 
words_drac = [w for w in words_drac if w]
words_drac = [w.lower() for w in words_drac if w]
print(words_drac)
```

```{python}
#cleaning peter pan

import re

words_pan = re.split(r"[\s\W]+", pan) 
words_pan = [w for w in words_pan if w]
words_pan = [w.lower() for w in words_pan if w]
print(words_pan)
```

```{python}
#total words 

len(words_drac)
len(words_pan)
```

```{python}
#total unique words in dracula

unique_drac = []

for word in words_drac:
  if word not in unique_drac:
    unique_drac.append(word)
    
len(unique_drac)

#total unique words in peter pan

unique_pan = []

for word in words_pan:
  if word not in unique_pan:
    unique_pan.append(word)
    
len(unique_pan)
```

```{python}
#average word length

ch_words_drac = []
ch_words_pan = []

for word in words_drac:
  ch_words_drac.append(len(word))
print((sum(ch_words_drac))/len(words_drac))

for word in words_pan:
  ch_words_pan.append(len(word))
print((sum(ch_words_pan))/len(words_pan))
```

```{python}
#number of adverbs

drac_adv = []
pan_adv = []

for word in words_drac:
    if word.endswith("ly"):
        drac_adv.append(word)
        
for word in words_pan:
    if word.endswith("ly"):
        pan_adv.append(word)

print(len(drac_adv))
print(len(pan_adv))
```
